name: Rage Rocket!
description:
In Rage Rocket, navigate twisting passages filled with dangerous obstacles and see if you can make it through alive! Pilot your lone spaceship through turrets, meteors, enemies, and more in this fast-paced 2D game. 

I still want to add a lot to this game and it's still in development (music is a must!), so it would be awesome if you provide any comments, feedback, or questions! Please enjoy! :)

Also, I am aware of the weird bug that sometimes the ship randomly stops? Apologies and I am working on fixing it ;)
